DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Study Fibrin Sealant Grifols Evaluated Adjunct Hemostasis
DOC.detailed_description: The trial consist 2 part : Preliminary Part ( I ) Primary Part ( II ) . All subject enrol Preliminary Part ( I ) treat FS Grifols . Subjects Primary Part ( II ) randomly allocate 2:1 ratio treatment FS Grifols manual compression . The objective study evaluate hemostasis effectiveness FS Grifols peripheral vascular surgery assess clinical safety , viral safety , immunogenicity .
